title: G Herbo Interview and More
itunes:title: G Herbo Interview and More
description:
Wednesday 10/4 - Today on the show we had G Herbo come by where he spoke about the meaning of his album, Chance the Rapper and more. Also Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to TV Preacher Pat Robinson because of his comments towards the Las Vegas massacre and Angela helped some listeners out during "Ask Yee".

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Wednesday 10/4 - Today on the show we had G Herbo come by where he spoke about the meaning of his album, Chance the Rapper and more. Also Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to TV Preacher Pat Robinson because of his comments towards the Las Vegas massacre and Angela helped some listeners out during "Ask Yee".
